content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No structures have been successfully constructed on the map. Multiple attempts were made to place and craft a Lab at (0.5, 2.5), but none succeeded due to inventory and resource issues. Although existing furnaces at (5.0, 5.0) and (–27.0, –60.0) were used for smelting operations, these were pre‐existing and not built by the agent.

ERROR TIPS
• Errors in calling get_entities:
 – When using get_entities, ensure the call matches its defined signature. Do not include unsupported keyword arguments (such as “radius”) and avoid passing unintended positional arguments.
 
• Lab placement and iteration issues:
 – Verify that the inventory contains a Lab before attempting placement at a target position.
 – Check that the return value from get_entities is a valid iterable (or reliably fallback to an empty list) before filtering for Lab entities.
 
• Crafting chain and ingredient shortages:
 – Confirm that all necessary sub‐ingredients (e.g. iron‐gear–wheel, electronic–circuit, copper–cable) are available. Prior to initiating Lab crafting, ensure additional resource production (via smelting or other methods) has provided sufficient precursor materials.
 – Continuously monitor and validate inventory counts against recipe requirements to avoid missing ingredients during Lab crafting attempts.
